name: ESCAPE DADDYS HOME
description:
"They told you to stay away... they warned you of the horrors... they told you to... Keep out of Daddy's Home!"

Try and escape Daddy's Home with your life! Find all 4 keys to escape Daddy's clutches! Beware, Daddy gets what Daddy wants!

Features include:
  • Stamina & Health
  • Inventory
  • Stealth
  • Spooky AI
  • Dialogue & Notes
  • Puzzles
  • Locked Doors
  • Heavy Breathing
  • and more!
Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • Left CTRL - Crouch
  • Space - Jump
  • Escape - Pause
  • Tab - Inventory
  • F - Toggle/Equip
  • LMB - Interact/Pickup
